title: Ticket #4501: IPv6: Wrong NETWORK_INTERFACE shouldn't be allowed.
description:
Given: 
ENABLE_IPV4=TRUE
ENABLE_IPV6=FALSE
NETWORK_INTERFACE = fe80::21e:4fff:fe9d:98f4

Daemons will bind to the IPv6 interface. This is wrong. If IPv6 is disabled, it should be an error to specify an IPv6 interface. The same goes for specifying an IPv4 interface when ENABLE_IPV4=FALSE.
remarks:
2017-Dec-19 12:07:08 by jfrey:
This works as expected in Condor 8.6 and 8.7. Abandoning this ticket.
